roleset.name: show no respect or regard for
roleset.note: DISRESPECT-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from disrespect.01-v)

role.descr: theme, thing no respect shown for

example.name: transitive
example.text: This is a practice that [*T*-20] disrespects the agreement between the twoassociations .
example.arg: the agreement between the two associations
